mapper.select: select jafields.FieldName as "fieldName", jafields.FieldID as "fieldId", jafields.isCommon as "isCommon", jafields.SortKey as "sortKey", jafields.FieldWidth as "fieldWidth", jafields.FieldAlign as "fieldAlign", ifnull(jac.DataFormat, '') as "dataFormat" from covi_approval4j.jwf_aggregation_forms jaf inner join covi_approval4j.jwf_aggregation_fields jafields on jaf.AggFormId = jafields.AggFormId left outer join covi_approval4j.jwf_aggregation_commonfields jac on jac.deletedDate is null and jafields.isCommon = 'Y' and jafields.FieldID = jac.FieldID and jaf.EntCode = jac.EntCode where jaf.AggFormId = #{aggFormId} and jafields.DisplayYN = 'Y' order by jafields.SortKey

select count(sub.FormInstID) as "count" from covi_approval4j.${tableName} sub inner join covi_approval4j.jwf_forminstance jf on sub.FormInstID = jf.FormInstID inner join covi_approval4j.jwf_process jp on jf.processID = jp.processID
jp.DeleteDate is null AND jf.DeletedDate is null
AND jf.CompletedDate IS NULL
AND jp.ProcessState = 528 AND jp.BusinessState LIKE '02_01%'
AND jp.ProcessState = 528 AND jp.BusinessState LIKE '02_02%'
AND jf.InitiatorName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
AND jf.InitiatorUnitName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
AND jf.Subject LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')

select
d.${item.fieldId} jf.${item.fieldId}
sub.${item.fieldId}
, jf.formInstId as "formInstId" , jf.processId as "processId" , jf.formId as "formId"
from covi_approval4j.${tableName} sub inner join covi_approval4j.jwf_forminstance jf on sub.FormInstID = jf.FormInstID inner join covi_approval4j.jwf_process jp on jf.processID = jp.processID inner join covi_approval4j.JWF_ProcessDescription d ON jp.ProcessDescriptionID = d.ProcessDescriptionID
jp.DeleteDate is null AND jf.DeletedDate is null
AND jf.CompletedDate IS NULL
AND jp.ProcessState = 528 AND jp.BusinessState LIKE '02_01%'
AND jp.ProcessState = 528 AND jp.BusinessState LIKE '02_02%'
AND jf.InitiatorName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
AND jf.InitiatorUnitName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
AND jf.Subject LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
, jf.${sortColumn} , sub.${sortColumn}
ASC DESC
, jf.InitiatedDate DESC
LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{pageOffset}
